articles.title: How the Queen has balanced motherhood and the monarchy through the years - 9Honey
articles.content:
Prince Charles, the eldest of the Queen's four children, was only four when his mother picked up her father's crown and became Queen of England. Princess Anne, his younger sister, wasn't even three.
Just 25 herself, Elizabeth was a new mother, a young wife a… [+8859 chars]

articles.title: Tea with mum: Nicole Kidman's Mother's Day wish - The Age
articles.description: Like many people separated from their loved ones, the actress will not spend this Mother's Day with her mum, Janelle.
articles.content: Speaking via telephone from Nashville, there is tenderness in Kidman's voice. We are a world away from the more familiar machinery of Hollywood and press junkets. Instead, Kidman says, "we're in a position where we just have to relinquish control right now an… [+4632 chars]

articles.title: 'My entire life is different': How COVID-19 upended the lives of young people - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The careers, studies, travel plans and social lives of young people in Sydney have been dramatically affected by COVID-19.
articles.content:
With social activities curtailed and job losses disproportionately affecting sectors like hospitality that employ young people, the pandemic has had a significant impact on young adults.
